info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 17 at 1:27AM MDT until August 18 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Temperatures this afternoon will heat up into the mid 90s to around 100 degrees in the valleys, but they will only fall into the 60s overnight. * WHERE...The Interstate 90 Corridor between Bozeman and Whitehall. * WHEN...From Noon today to Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.
